extendedInfo.description: âââââ App Storeâs Best Game of 2012 ââââââââââ App Storeâs Best New Game of 2012 ââââââââââ App Storeâs iPhone App of the Week âââââChosen Apple Store's Best Game of 2012, Angry Words is an addictive word game that has already exceeded 8 million downloads. Challenge your friends and enjoy yourself by making words! You can play whenever you want and against whomever you want: It is an asynchronous, cross-platform, multi-player game. You can play against your friends or against random opponents. And there are unlimited simultaneous games!Combine the letters in your rack with the ones in the board, and use the bonus squares to get more points. You can double and even triple the value of the letters you use or the words you make! Besides, if you manage to use all the letters on the rack in one same move, Angry Words will reward you with 40 extra points.Angry Words has an intuitive and sophisticated interface, and has animations so you can revive your best moves.You can play in 12 different languages: Spanish, British English, American English, Catalan, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese and, now, also Basque!Start playing Angry Words on Facebook!If you like Angry Words, check out Word Crack!Already a fan of the game?Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/PlayAngryWordsFollow us on Twitter: @PlayAngryWords

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: This is a fun game but I wish I had more people to play against.

reviews.comment: Well presented and nice interactive interface. One of the best puzzlers on the market spoilt by force close issues otherwise 5 stars

reviews.title: Too many force closes
reviews.comment: I love the game, but it is force closing every 2 minutes ... frustrating.  Please, fix.
reviews.author: Heather Prough-Brown

reviews.title: Kapow! Awesome!
reviews.comment: Best word game ever! This game just keep getting better and better with each update. After the last update the app kept crashing before it could open,entirely. But surprise the dev fixed it right away!And now it\'s ranked up there with the very best word games ever developed. GENIUS! I wholeheartedly recommend this game if you enjoy fun word games. This is It.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just amazing...I m hooked to it. YES COMPLETELY
reviews.comment: it keep me in contact with my partner  plus we also get to use words not being used for long. in other words it\'s a good way to keep in touch with loved ones.. I also play with people across borders and I would add its a great way to socialise n to know about different cultures even without actually meeting the person cheers ..Anil .

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Very good game, easy, clran, pretty & super fun

reviews.title: Beats WWFs by a mile
reviews.comment: Works as it should. Ads present but not intrusive. Doesn\'t constantly try to pair me up with random strangers whether I want to or not. Loving it.

reviews.comment: This used to be one of the most awesome games! But now even with a stable wifi, won\'t refresh the games. Devs please fix!
